backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining tasks, recurring chores, cooking assignments, and profiles with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing readiness‑check improvements and listing affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Precomputed summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and base UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling auth initialization and rendering the tabbed task, dinner, calendar, and people views.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskDialog.ts: Dialog for creating tasks with actor‑availability checks and voice dictation for name and description fields.
frontend/src/components/CalendarDayPlann: Daily planner view showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores with navigation and task completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Main calendar component handling month/week/day views, data fetching, and mapping tasks, chores, and cooking assignments to dates.
frontend/src/components/CalendarWeekPlan: Weekly planner showing tasks, chores, and cooking assignments for each day with navigation and task completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx: Manages weekly cooking assignments with editing dialogs, fairness stats, and voice dictation for meal descriptions.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing task details including assignee, due date, and voice‑dictated name/description fields.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app title and user account menu with logout support.
frontend/src/components/LightweightMonth: Compact month grid displaying day-level markers for tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores with month navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders a login UI using Internet Identity, showing branding, an image, and a sign‑in button with loading state.
frontend/src/components/People.tsx: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of person profiles with colors and principals, including dialogs and validations.
frontend/src/components/PersonBadge.tsx: Displays a colored badge with an optional color dot and size/variant styling.
frontend/src/components/PersonProfileSel: Provides a dropdown or manual entry field for selecting or entering a principal, with optional 'Me' autofill.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresD: Dialog for creating, editing, pausing, and deleting recurring chores with voice dictation, validation, and scheduling options.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresI: Displays a preview of grouped recurring chores with expand/collapse behavior and a button to manage them.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Lists household tasks with grouping, completion toggles, editing, deletion, and access to recurring chore management.
frontend/src/components/TodayFocus.tsx: Displays tasks and cooking assignments due today, showing skeletons while loading. Filters tasks by date and renders task items with completion status.
frontend/src/components/VoiceDictationBu: Renders a voice input toggle button with dynamic icons and tooltip messaging. Handles disabled states and starts or stops dictation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity. Recreates the actor when identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithReadiness: Wraps useActor to add readiness, initialization, and error state. Helps gate mutations until the actor is fully initialized.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication. Loads stored identities, handles login flow, and exposes identity status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePeopleProfilesQuer: Provides queries and mutations for person profiles backed by the actor. Includes readiness guarding, cache invalidation, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains task and cooking assignment queries and mutations using the backend actor. Guards availability, invalidates caches, and emits toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeedSampleData.ts: Empty file placeholder for sample‑data seeding logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: Implements a state hook synced with sessionStorage, supporting functional updates. Reads initial value from storage and persists updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceDictation.ts: React hook wrapping Web Speech API for dictation with support checks, event handling, and transcript/error callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables for light/dark theme colors and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/webSpeech.d.ts: TypeScript ambient definitions for the Web Speech API's SpeechRecognition interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/actorAvailability.ts: Helper for interpreting and guarding actor readiness state with user‑friendly messages.
Utilities for formatting and stringifying actor initialization diagnostic contexts and errors.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utilities ensuring correct optional Candid encoding for principals and generic values.
frontend/src/utils/cookingAssignmentLabe: Functions that derive display labels and colors for cooking assignments from profiles or principals.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Structured diagnostic logging helpers for deployment/init steps with guidance on failures.
frontend/src/utils/fairness.ts: Computes fairness statistics for cooking assignments across date ranges with labels and colors.
frontend/src/utils/personProfiles.ts: Resolves principals to display labels and colors using person profiles with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Provides safe parsing and validation helpers for Principal IDs without throwing errors.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreDiagnos: Logs structured diagnostics for recurring‑chore mutations, including start, outcome, and safe error stringification.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreMutatio: Normalizes backend and agent errors into user‑friendly messages with detailed diagnostics for recurring‑chore operations.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresPrevie: Generates weekday‑grouped and upcoming chore lists and converts timeline enums into display labels.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresSchedu: Determines which recurring chores should appear on specific dates based on timeline rules and filters accordingly.
frontend/src/utils/taskDayKey.ts: Converts dates or due‑date timestamps into normalized yyyy‑MM‑dd day keys.
frontend/src/utils/taskDueDayGrouping.ts: Groups tasks by normalized day keys, sorts them, and appends a 'no due date' group.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/voiceDictationDiagnos: Logs structured diagnostics for voice‑dictation lifecycle events and errors without revealing transcript content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color system, extended theming, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and feature requests related to improving actor initialization and backend readiness diagnostics.
